biotools.summary: Output reads with low quality bases trimmed (at the extremities) or masked and/or with quality descreased to the minimum. Output an extra singlet dataset if paired-end data provided.

bioschemas.name: fqquality
bioschemas.summary: Output reads with low quality bases trimmed (at the extremities) or masked and/or with quality descreased to the minimum. Output an extra singlet dataset if paired-end data provided.
